name: Amy Adkins
text: Scott Jones d/b/a Jones is Thirsty is fantastic and knowledgeable of extremely good wines at very reasonable prices.  He has worked our annual fundraiser for United Way of Alabama for the past two years.  I would highly recommend Scott Jones for a private wine tasting at your home with guests, or a large fundraiser.   We have always had a good turnout, with money left to donate!

resp.text: Thanks, Amy! I appreciate the kind words...and for the opportunity to partner with awesome organizations like United Way of Alabama to do my part in giving back to the Birmingham community.

name: Sally French
text: I went to one of Scott's classes this week and he did an exceptional job! The class was very fun and informative. The no-snobbery education made a comfortable atmosphere for discussion and questions. I was pleased to find all of the wines we tasted at my grocery store without any issue and they were all within my price range! I would definitely recommend one of Scott's classes to anyone wanting a fun and laid-back wine tasting experience!

resp.text: So glad to hear you enjoyed the education/tasting session! I appreciate the kind words and good thoughts.

name: Marilyn Lindsey
text: I have participated in two different wine tasting events with Scott - one with friends and one with co-workers at a holiday party.  Both events have been absolutely AWESOME.  Scott shares his immeasurable knowledge of the wines during the tasting and it takes the whole experience to another level.  Highly Recommend!!!

resp.text: Thanks, Marilyn! I appreciate the kind words!

name: Brent Fuhrman
text: His wine knowledge is impressive but his ability to translate that knowledge is what sets him apart!

resp.text: Thanks for the kind words and good thoughts, Brent! Working hard to spread the No-Snobbery doctrine in Birmingham and Nashville!

name: Derrick Mcbride
text: 5 Star s rated outstanding Google maps online business and Google maps and Google photos and Google media and Google photos Shared Listed Nationwide Worldwide 💯 in Google News for I am. Listed Nationwide Worldwide 💯 True Story Rank 1 st in America

name: Qwazy Symbiote
text: It is a good way to share experiences and help give people an idea of wether or not they want to visit or  use a particular business or place. However their ratings system does not really work and is actually quite inaccurate even misleading based on many of the reviews.

name: Lawrence Krug
text: Sadly, Google Maps is toying with their reviews of restaurants. As a result, the ratings are corrupt and useless. Every place has four stars - unlikely.

name: Lil Joe
text: Latey Google maps has been taking me out of the way and not just a little bit out of my way but miles out of my way in the town of Weatherford Texas I am a delivery driver so this is an inconvenience.

name: Carl Knuckles
text: I use this app all the time and I like its updates but sometimes it freezes or just completely stops working and for the most part it finds the destination but a trucker edition or add on would be a much greater value. I can’t take every shortcut or every road through a business area. Thanks in advance

name: Robert Bentley Motors Inc.
text:
We used YP for 10 years and paid $7500 a year. Jangles offered their services which was several additional services for over half price. We gave them a shot and are very satisfied & are happy to recommend Jangles .
Jangles designed my business Digital & Print Business Cards. Designed a Custom Logo. Built Us A Website as well established us on over 5 of the mist popular Social Media Sites. They also added our business on all the search engines so that when potential customers search for our business field we pull up as 1 of the 1st you see. Our Business Base increased 2 fold.

name: Elite Contruction
text: Great Service. Set our Business Up With The Right Plan 6 Months Ago Because Our Customer Base has Tripled..Thanks Jangles😀!

text: I "search(ed) google maps".

text: Great Advertising Business ! really helped our business!

text: Advertising

text: Great customer service 👍

name: Melanie Brumfield
text: Great Advertising Biz!

name: Seth Worley
text: I use the Curse Client all of the time--especially for World of Warcraft! I just started using Curse Voice and find it to be one of the better VoIPs out there because it is so easy to use. Voice chatting in it is even easier than Skype!

name: Bgg Staff
text: Great company with terrific values!

name: Bill Armistead
text: Image Hive did an outstanding job of transferring over 100 super eight videos onto a thumb drive with outstanding quality. And, they are right here in Birmingham. So there is no need to box up your videos and ship them off to another state to have them transferred. I could not be more pleased!  I highly recommend them!

name: Theodore Campbell
text: Great quality in and out I no time fast service will use again

resp.text: Thank you, glad we could help.

name: D. Seibert
text: The staff at Image Hive are incredible to work with!  So far, they have done script prep, teleprompter, studio shooting and final editing of over 30 of my online course videos and are now working on a new course with me.  I just love working with Steven, Dimi, Kat and the others there, that are most professional and caring about me and my projects.  They go overboard and I would strongly recommend them if you have a video project.

resp.text: Dear Don, thank you so much for your kind words. You are a great client to work with too. We hope your goal for many more people quit smoking be very successful.

name: Barbara Franklin
text: I prepared a video history for my organization and had Image Hive to reproduce it for me.  Kat was so helpful.  She converted the format, added chapters, assisted me with the cover graphics and produced my requested copies very quickly.  She provided superb service and helped us provide an amateur video that looked professional.  Everyone was pleased.  She was great and very professional.  Thanks, Kat.

name: CLIFF STROUT
text: When my mother in law passed away, I took her old 8mm Home movies to these people. They went above and beyond cleaning the dust, adding shots of film titles in her handwriting. They made a wonderful movie for us as a family keepsake. Everyone loved it.

name: Jacob delaRosa
text: Image Hive is my go-to choice for studio rental when I need an indoor location for my clients. They offer all the lighting equipment and backdrops you could ask for. Their enormous cyc wall is just amazing! You can comfortably shoot anything from products, large groups of people and even vehicles in their space. They also offer film scanning services for old home movies on VHS and super 8 film. Highly recommended!

name: Jeff Nelson
text: We had several old 8mm movie reels that we needed transferred to digital and DVD formats.  The results were great and we were very happy.  I would recommend your services to anyone with a similar need.

name: Micah Wade
text: The folks at Image Hive have been helping me secure my family’s memories for over three years now. Steven, Mark, and their staff are professional and helpful. As a mom, I was so stressed out about saving videos of my children, since I didn’t have the time or skills to do it on my own. Someone referred me to Image Hive and I’ve been so relieved ever since. They also run regular specials! 5 STARS, Image Hive!

name: Hilda Johnson
text:
Great job on my videos and great people to work with. Very quick return getting my videos back. Very pleased and anxious to have more done.
Hilda Johnson

name: Lee Winnige
text: These guys did a great job of scanning my old family photos. Great service and friendly staff. I highly recommend them.

name: Richard Schlinkert
text: I took in about thirty 35mm slides to transfer to digital, and while they turned the order around quickly, the slides had dust and lint in them and were very low resolution for the cost, which is about twice what the mail-in services charge for twice the resolution.  Unless you are in a hurry, look elsewhere

resp.text:
Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  We're sorry that the final results of your scanning order did not meet your expectations.  We pride ourselves on giving each order personal attention and all of the work we do is done in our Birmingham location (in the historic Avondale neighborhood).
We recall your order very clearly.  You chose our PROOF quality (700 ppi) for your slide scanning order, which our lowest resolution (and lowest priced).  We also offer ARCHIVE quality scans (1700 ppi) at a slighlty higher cost.  Our scanning service, whether Proof or Archive level, includes the utilization of dust removal software, which can remove superficial debris and blemishes on the scanned images.
Our technician specifically noted the high concentration of dust on your slides before scanning your slides.  Prior to scanning your order, our tech  attempted to manually clean each of your slides by hand to remove the dust and lint you described.  Unfortunately, dust and lint are often stuck to the film itself and may not be removed except by rewashing or physically wiping the film with a chemical solution.
We are generally unwilling to do such aggressive cleaning, out of fear we might damage our clients irreplaceable originals.  More often, if the condition of the originals is so bad that our usual cleaning and post-production are insufficient, we can do restorastion to the scanned images.  This digital retouching is not inexpensive, but for extremely valuable or badly deteriorated images, it is often the best option.
Again, we're sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied with our service.  We would welcome the opportunity to regain your confidence.

name: Floyde Young
text: Nice spot for photography

name: Dave Loftin
text: Image Hive did a great job transferring some old video tapes for me. Awesome folks to deal with.

name: Lisa Wienhold
text: Hive did a great job with a bunch of old family photos.  I was very pleased.   Fast great service !

name: Robin Anderson
text: Very helpful staff, she did a great job, this is a good place!

resp.text: Thank you! Cat is wonderful, glad to hear from happy customers!

name: tania mendoza
text: I rented the photography studio at Image Hive recently to see if I could get a professional-looking profile pic for my CV, having a friend to take the picture instead of hiring a professional photographer. It turned out way better than I'd imagined. I'm so glad we did it ourselves! The place has a very creative vibe about it and the people there were very encouraging and helpful, without being intrusive. I also discovered that they convert all kinds of old media, like vhs tapes, film reels, and slides to digital. So, I'll be making a return trip after I go through my closets!

name: Linda Bryant
text: Great studio rental price. The people at Image Hive are experanced and helpful. Overall perfect shoot.

name: Tyler Kemp
text: Great and experanced staff. Great studio for everything I needed. They also do film and tape transfers!

name: Tyler Kemp
text: Great and experanced staff. Great studio for everything I needed. They also do film and tape transfers!

name: Jennifer Ralph
text: Image Hive converted some of my old VHS tapes to DVD's and computer files, and I was very pleased with the service and results!

resp.text: Great, thank you so much for great review! We are so happy we were able to help!

name: Lee Walthall
text: Image Hive has helped me convert old video recordings to digital files and duplicate CDs on several occasions and I was extremely pleased with their timely high quality service and reasonable price

name: elizabeth cypher
text: Staff very knowledgeable and efficient. Prompt and just what I needed!

name: Collin Balentine
text: Had a great studio perfect for shooting photography and video.

name: Dima Ant
text: Service is great and fast. Everything was done to my specifications. Great people in general.

name: Cameron Balentine
text: Can restore and duplicate and enlarge old photos..check them out! Great poster size made at a great price!

name: Mike Bryant
text: Had a great set-up and knowledgeable staff. Also flexiable with time.

name: Norman Virciglio
text: Great Job on transferring 50 year old 8mm to digital.
